These packages are only used by the Bay of Plenty Regional Council (BOPRC) and are therefore not publicly available. Please see [Lesson 2: Introduction to BOPRC's Interal Databases and Packages](https://github.com/JamesBOPRC/BOPRC_R_Course_Lesson_2) for a vignette on this tutorial.
